description:
J.D. Biersdorfer has been answering technology questions for The New York Times — in print, on the web, in audio and in video — since 1998.
She also writes the Sunday Book Review’s regular “Applied Reading” column on ebooks and literary apps, among other things. Outside The Times, Ms. Biersdorfer is the author or co-author of eight books on consumer-technology topics and co-hosts the independent Pop Tech Jam podcast.
title: J. D. Biersdorfer
text:
J.D. Biersdorfer has been answering technology questions for The New York Times — in print, on the web, in audio and in video — since 1998.
She also writes the Sunday Book Review’s regular “Applied Reading” column on ebooks and literary apps, among other things. Outside The Times, Ms. Biersdorfer is the author or co-author of eight books on consumer-technology topics and co-hosts the independent Pop Tech Jam podcast.
